problem_names:
lemma add_0_right_vecset:
  assumes "(A :: 'a :: monoid_add vec set) \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
  shows "A + {0\<^sub>v n} = A"

lemma add_0_left_vecset:
  assumes "(A :: 'a :: monoid_add vec set) \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
  shows "{0\<^sub>v n} + A = A"

lemma assoc_add_vecset:
  assumes "(A :: 'a :: semigroup_add vec set) \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
    and "B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
    and "C \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
  shows "A + (B + C) = (A + B) + C"
lemma sum_carrier_vec[intro]: "A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n \<Longrightarrow> B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n \<Longrightarrow> A + B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"

lemma comm_add_vecset:
  assumes "(A :: 'a :: ab_semigroup_add vec set) \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
    and "B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
  shows "A + B = B + A"
translations:
lemma add_0_right_vecset:
  assumes "(A :: 'a :: monoid_add vec set) \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
  shows "A + {0\<^sub>v n} = A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + {0\<^sub>v n} = A
unfolding set_plus_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {c. \<exists>a\<in>A. \<exists>b\<in>{0\<^sub>v n}. c = a + b} = A
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {c. \<exists>a\<in>A. \<exists>b\<in>{0\<^sub>v n}. c = a + b} = A
by force

lemma add_0_left_vecset:
  assumes "(A :: 'a :: monoid_add vec set) \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
  shows "{0\<^sub>v n} + A = A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {0\<^sub>v n} + A = A
unfolding set_plus_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {c. \<exists>a\<in>{0\<^sub>v n}. \<exists>b\<in>A. c = a + b} = A
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {c. \<exists>a\<in>{0\<^sub>v n}. \<exists>b\<in>A. c = a + b} = A
by force

lemma assoc_add_vecset:
  assumes "(A :: 'a :: semigroup_add vec set) \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
    and "B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
    and "C \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
  shows "A + (B + C) = (A + B) + C"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
fix x

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
assume "x \<in> A + (B + C)"

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> A + (B + C)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> A + (B + C)
obtain a b c where "x = a + (b + c)" and *: "a \<in> A" "b \<in> B" "c \<in> C"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> A + (B + C)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>a b c.
        \<lbrakk>x = a + (b + c); a \<in> A; b \<in> B; c \<in> C\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
unfolding set_plus_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> {c. \<exists>a\<in>A.
                 \<exists>b\<in>{c. \<exists>a\<in>B.
 \<exists>b\<in>C. c = a + b}.
                    c = a + b}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>a b c.
        \<lbrakk>x = a + (b + c); a \<in> A; b \<in> B; c \<in> C\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  x = a + (b + c)
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
with assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  C \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  x = a + (b + c)
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C
have "x = (a + b) + c"

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  C \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  x = a + (b + c)
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = a + b + c
using assoc_add_vec[of a n b c]

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  C \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  x = a + (b + c)
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C
  \<lbrakk>a \<in> carrier_vec n; b \<in> carrier_vec n;
   c \<in> carrier_vec n\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> a + b + c = a + (b + c)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = a + b + c
by force

proof (state)
this:
  x = a + b + c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
with *

proof (chain)
picking this:
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C
  x = a + b + c
have "x \<in> (A + B) + C"

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C
  x = a + b + c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> A + B + C
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> A + B + C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C

proof (state)
this:
  ?x2 \<in> A + (B + C) \<Longrightarrow> ?x2 \<in> A + B + C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  ?x2 \<in> A + (B + C) \<Longrightarrow> ?x2 \<in> A + B + C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C

proof (state)
this:
  ?x2 \<in> A + (B + C) \<Longrightarrow> ?x2 \<in> A + B + C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
fix x

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
assume "x \<in> (A + B) + C"

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> A + B + C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> A + B + C
obtain a b c where "x = (a + b) + c" and *: "a \<in> A" "b \<in> B" "c \<in> C"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> A + B + C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>a b c.
        \<lbrakk>x = a + b + c; a \<in> A; b \<in> B; c \<in> C\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
unfolding set_plus_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> {c. \<exists>a\<in>{c. \<exists>a\<in>A.
                                    \<exists>b\<in>B. c = a + b}.
                 \<exists>b\<in>C. c = a + b}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>a b c.
        \<lbrakk>x = a + b + c; a \<in> A; b \<in> B; c \<in> C\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  x = a + b + c
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
with assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  C \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  x = a + b + c
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C
have "x = a + (b + c)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  C \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  x = a + b + c
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = a + (b + c)
using assoc_add_vec[of a n b c]

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  C \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
  x = a + b + c
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C
  \<lbrakk>a \<in> carrier_vec n; b \<in> carrier_vec n;
   c \<in> carrier_vec n\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> a + b + c = a + (b + c)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = a + (b + c)
by force

proof (state)
this:
  x = a + (b + c)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
with *

proof (chain)
picking this:
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C
  x = a + (b + c)
have "x \<in> A + (B + C)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> A
  b \<in> B
  c \<in> C
  x = a + (b + c)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> A + (B + C)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> A + (B + C)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C

proof (state)
this:
  ?x2 \<in> A + B + C \<Longrightarrow> ?x2 \<in> A + (B + C)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ?x2 \<in> A + (B + C) \<Longrightarrow> ?x2 \<in> A + B + C
  ?x2 \<in> A + B + C \<Longrightarrow> ?x2 \<in> A + (B + C)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x2 \<in> A + (B + C) \<Longrightarrow> ?x2 \<in> A + B + C
  ?x2 \<in> A + B + C \<Longrightarrow> ?x2 \<in> A + (B + C)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + (B + C) = A + B + C
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  A + (B + C) = A + B + C

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma sum_carrier_vec[intro]: "A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n \<Longrightarrow> B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n \<Longrightarrow> A + B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>A \<subseteq> carrier_vec n;
     B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> A + B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n
unfolding set_plus_def
by force

lemma comm_add_vecset:
  assumes "(A :: 'a :: ab_semigroup_add vec set) \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
    and "B \<subseteq> carrier_vec n"
  shows "A + B = B + A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A + B = B + A
unfolding set_plus_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {c. \<exists>a\<in>A. \<exists>b\<in>B. c = a + b} =
    {c. \<exists>a\<in>B. \<exists>b\<in>A. c = a + b}
using comm_add_vec assms
by blast
end
